revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A series of plays: in which it is attempted to delineate the stronger passions of the mind. Each passion being the subject of a tragedy and a comedy / by Joanna Bail..."
revision.text: Possibly: A series of plays: in which it is attempted to delineate the stronger passions of the mind. Each passion being the subject of a tragedy and a comedy / by Joanna Baillie. 3rd ed. (London : Printed by T. Cadell, Jun. and W. Davies, 1800). (Plays on the Passions). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1302771~S1
